amendment.description: Amendment allows grants for young witness protection to include support for young witnesses who are trying to leave a criminal gang or support to prevent initial gang recruitment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 109-279 toadd the following grant guideline for young witness assistance, "support for young witnesses who are trying to leave a criminal gang and information to prevent initial gang recruitment.".
